Gets the current number of connected displays.
checkNumOfConnectedDisplays() - Method in class com.dhk.io.DisplayConfigUpdater
Detects if there was a change in the number of connected displays, and if there was, then the settings manager, model, view, and controllers will be re-initialized to reflect the new display configuration.
